name: JIM THORPE AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT and Penn Forest Township v. CARBON COUNTY TAX CLAIM BUREAU. Petition of Lawrence MARRA
name_abbreviation: Jim Thorpe Area School District v. Carbon County Tax Claim Bureau

judges: McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: JIM THORPE AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT and Penn Forest Township v. CARBON COUNTY TAX CLAIM BUREAU. Petition of Lawrence MARRA.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of November, 1991, the PAA is granted. The Order of the Commonwealth Court quashing the Petitioner’s appeal is reversed. See Westinghouse v. Board of Property Assessment and Revision, 525 Pa. 80, 575 A.2d 550 (1990). This matter is remanded to the Commonwealth Court for disposition of the appeal.
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
599 A.2d 972
JIM THORPE AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT and Penn Forest Township v. CARBON COUNTY TAX CLAIM BUREAU. Petition of Lawrence MARRA.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 13, 1991.
